mapper.select: SELECT FEE_KND_CD AS "feeKndCd" , FEE_NAME AS "feeName" , ACTS_CD AS "actsCd" , ACT_NAME AS "actName" FROM IBIMS421B WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(FEE_KND_CD) ASC
SELECT LPAD( NVL( (SELECT MAX(FEE_KND_CD) FROM IBIMS421B a ) , 0 ) +1 , 2, '0' ) AS FEE_KND_CD FROM DUAL

SELECT FEE_KND_CD /* 수수료종류코드 */ , ACTS_CD /* 계정과목코드 */ , RGST_STTS_CD /* 등록상태코드 */ , FEE_NAME /* 수수료명 */ , FEE_RCOG_DCD /* 수수료인식구분코드 */ , FEE_RCKN_DCD /* 수수료산정구분코드 */ , FEE_RT /* 수수료율 */ , FEE_LWST_AMT /* 수수료최저금액 */ , FEE_HGST_AMT /* 수수료최고금액 */ , ACT_NAME /* 계정과목명 */ , ACCT_JOB_CD /* 회계업무코드 */ , ACCT_UN_JOB_CD /* 회계단위업무코드 */ , ACCT_TR_CD /* 회계거래코드 */ , HND_DETL_DTM /* 조작상세일시 */ , HND_EMPNO /* 조작사원번호 */ , HND_TMNL_NO /* 조작단말기번호 */ , HND_TR_ID /* 조작거래ID */ , GUID /* GUID */ FROM IBIMS421B WHERE 1=1 AND FEE_NAME LIKE '%'|| #{feeName} ||'%' ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(FEE_KND_CD) ASC
